title: The Candyman (CRS107)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode. A story that Ray Christian first shared on the podcast in February of 2016 about a beloved childhood friend and deviant monster.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Ray Christian)
